price: Or do they have associate-gods? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods[8], if they are truthful.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: [8] whom they took as partners with Allah.
